translations: [军] 兵器制造者；[军] 军械士

sentences.sentence: Brown Ben lets it go, but one day we'll get us a real armorer.
sentences.translation: 布朗·本对此熟视无睹但是有一天我们会给自己找到个真正的武器师傅。

sentences.sentence: His father had been an armorer at Bitterbridge, he said, so he had been born with the sound of steel ringing in his ears and had taken to swordplay at an early age.
sentences.translation: 他的父亲是个苦桥的武器匠，所以他是伴着钢铁交鸣的声音出生的，很早就对击剑着迷。
